body:
Am I alowed to post a map that me and ebirdy9 made (PermaFreeze) on another server?

Ebirdy said I'm not allowed but I dont belive him am i allowed
body_tagged:

title: Question for  A mod

replies.body: I'm a little confused here. Is it actually in rotation on a different server or was it just made on a different server?
replies.body_tagged: I'm a little confused here. Is it actually in rotation on a different server or was it just made on a different server?

replies.body: It was made for this server it is suposed to be in rotation but it doesent work
replies.body_tagged: It was made for this server it is suposed to be in rotation but it doesent work

reply_to.body: I'm a little confused here. Is it actually in rotation on a different server or was it just made on a different server?
reply_to.body_tagged: I'm a little confused here. Is it actually in rotation on a different server or was it just made on a different server?

replies.body: It's your map, so your choice.
replies.body_tagged: It's your map, so your choice.

replies.body: I tried to warn him that your not allowed to use a map from avicus and submit it to another server, he already made the post then "deleted" it... He proceeds to not believe me...
replies.body_tagged: I tried to warn him that your not allowed to use a map from avicus and submit it to another server, he already made the post then "deleted" it... He proceeds to not believe me...

replies.body: I don't see why it wouldn't be allowed then as long as you get a working YAML
replies.body_tagged: I don't see why it wouldn't be allowed then as long as you get a working YAML

replies.body: As far as I know you are not allowed because you made it for Avicus correct me if i'm wrong.
replies.body_tagged: As far as I know you are not allowed because you made it for Avicus correct me if i'm wrong.

replies.body: It's not avicus's property until it's in rotations. Right now it's his map, he can submit it to a different server if I wants to in pretty sure.
replies.body_tagged: It's not avicus's property until it's in rotations. Right now it's his map, he can submit it to a different server if I wants to in pretty sure.

reply_to.body: As far as I know you are not allowed because you made it for Avicus correct me if i'm wrong.
reply_to.body_tagged: As far as I know you are not allowed because you made it for Avicus correct me if i'm wrong.

replies.body: He can do what he wants with it
replies.body_tagged: He can do what he wants with it

replies.body: If the creators want to submit it to other servers, they can. It is their map. Avicus uses it because the creators gave it to them. The creators can give it to other servers too.
replies.body_tagged: If the creators want to submit it to other servers, they can. It is their map. Avicus uses it because the creators gave it to them. The creators can give it to other servers too.

replies.body:
If it's in the Avicus rotary, you're going to have to take it out before having it on another server. 
If you created the map initially for Avicus and it hasn't been accepted or you never posted it to the forums you can do whatever you want with it.
replies.body_tagged:
If it's in the Avicus rotary, you're going to have to take it out before having it on another server. 
If you created the map initially for Avicus and it hasn't been accepted or you never posted it to the forums you can do whatever you want with it.

replies.body:
You can, but keep in mind it will most likely be removed from Avicus' rotations.

Source: Asked ParaSpider if I could submit Palm Rust to OCN xD
replies.body_tagged:
